        public Image​(java.lang.String filename)

    • Method Detail

      • setSize

        public void setSize​(int width,
                    int height)
        Sets the size of the contained image. The image data stored beforehand will be lost.
        Parameters:
        width - new width of the image in pixels
        height - new width of the image in pixels

      • loadImage

        public boolean loadImage​(java.lang.String filename)
        Reads an image from a file.
        Parameters:
        filename - name of the image file to read
        Returns:
        true, if the image file was successfully read, false, otherwise

      • getWidth

        public int getWidth()
        Returns the width of the image in pixels.
        Returns:
        width of the image in pixels

      • getHeight

        public int getHeight()
        Returns the height of the image in pixels.
        Returns:
        height of the image in pixels

      • getType

        public int getType()
        Returns the color depth and color format of the image.
        Returns:
        color depth and format type

      • getData

        public java.nio.ByteBuffer getData()
        Returns a pointer to the raw image data. Pixels are stored in lines from left to right, bottom to top.
        Returns:
        pointer to raw image data

      • imageName

        public java.lang.String imageName()
        Returns the file name of the image. This will be an empty string if the image was neither read nor written to a file.
        Returns:
        file name

      • setImageName

        public void setImageName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the file name of the image This function is used by the Maya plugin to set a file name without the need of dealing with actual files.
        Parameters:
        name - new file name

      • getInternalFormat

        public int getInternalFormat()

      • setInternalFormat
